channel.title: [317 Delta] New donator class questions, will rep
channel.description:
So I added my regular donator etc, my client had the object already built in apparently.
Now, I recently made a model for a new donor class, and I coded the new class in, now I have a couple questions:
1) How can I make it so that it now loads my new symbol? Would it be client-sided or server sided? 2) Once add the symbol to my sprites folder, do I need to do anything server-sided from there?
Also, if you could. How would I assign a new crown to a new player rights (Player rights = 4 or something). The symbol was already made, and is already added to my sprites folder
Thank you!

item.title: [317 Delta] New donator class questions, will rep
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:

So I added my regular donator etc, my client had the object already built in apparently.

Now, I recently made a model for a new donor class, and I coded the new class in, now I have a couple questions:
